author: Staff Reporter
text:
Rallies and distribution of pamphlets marked the World Consumer Protection day celebrations here on Tuesday.

A rally was organised by Tamil Nadu Consumer and Public Rights Vigilance Committee in which its chairman S. Selvam and members of the committee participated. Pamphlets containing messages on consumer rights were distributed to the people. Consumers were asked to approach the consumer forum if they found discrepancies in the product or service offered by companies in the market. The pamphlets said that by approaching the consumer forum, their rights would be upheld.

Pamphlets were distributed by the committee members in Namakkal too.
title: Rallies held
